title: You and Me Against the World
description: The World is infected and humanity is reduced to creatures of vicious insanity. Doctor Thorn's rescue by a group of young survivors is just the beginning of their nightmarish journey.... a journey to survive where each will discover the sacrifices required for love and loyalty in a dead world. In this apocalyptic landscape, humankind has one final hope - a hope that rests on the strength and determination of ten young men and women.
author: Raymond Esposito
